summary:
Denki: So, how'd it go staying with kirishimas' family?
Bakugou: It was great. I mean they're just such a nice... I don't want...
body:
Denki: So, how’d it go staying with kirishimas’ family?

Bakugou: It was great. I mean they’re just such a nice… I don’t want to use the word “family” because they all like each other, but they’re such a nice group of people.

Mina: are you okay?

summary:
Kirishima: hey, do you like my outfit? 
Bakugou: Not as much as I like what's underneath it.
Kirishima, gasps and then laughs:...
body:
Kirishima: hey, do you like my outfit?

Bakugou: Not as much as I like what’s underneath it.

Kirishima, gasps and then laughs: katsuki!

Bakugou: I need your chair. Get up.

reblog.comment:
Kirishima: hey, do you like my outfit?

Bakugou: Not as much as I like what’s underneath it.

Kirishima, gasps and then laughs: katsuki!

Bakugou: I need your chair. Get up.

blog.name: dtjbsd
blog.title: DTJB Random
blog.description:
Mr./Doctor/Professor
Stuck in the divide between Gen X and the Millennials. Xennial?

Bit of an old fart from Iowa, mainly just use this to talk about my favorite programs and what not. I'm a fan of movies, music, anime, vidya games, etc. I usually ship everybody with everybody.

I'm also an artist so I'll post some of my work here, whenever I get around to making some. Anyone interested in viewing my art can visit my Deviant Art page.

dtjb.deviantart.com

summary:
Jesus I bet Kirishima is having the best day ever....
(*Also if someone wants to draw a comic strip where Kirishima & Bakugo are...
body:
Jesus I bet Kirishima is having the best day ever….


(*Also if someone wants to draw a comic strip where Kirishima & Bakugo are walking through the mall, Kirishima sees this in a shoe store window, He bolts into the store, & proceeds to dump all the crocs he can get to on the floor pretends to swim in them. Bonus points if Bakugo is both furious and blushingly happy at how happy Kirishima is.)

summary: Hey there! Mod Kenny here! I thought it would be really fun to create a playlist of songs that I associated with nighttime, and...
caption:
Hey there! Mod Kenny here!

I thought it would be really fun to create a playlist of songs that I associated with nighttime, and have you fireflies send in a song or two that reminds you, and I can add it to the playlist! We will reblog this post next week with the completed playlist!

Here is the playlist!

I picked some songs that my dad used to play or sing for me when I had trouble sleeping, as well as songs that remind me of night in general! If you don’t mind, it would be great for you to submit the name and artist of the song, and possibly tell us why you feel like it fits with a nighttime theme. I am happy to answer any sort of questions about any of my songs on our discord!

- Mod Kenny!

summary: It’s not ever going to be true but what if Shinsou really was the traitor? Like the one person who could easily root out the...
body:
It’s not ever going to be true but what if Shinsou really was the traitor? Like the one person who could easily root out the traitor was in fact the traitor. He could make someone say they were the traitor and he’d be off the hook. He’d know everything about everything because he could make people tell him.

Don’t @ me

reblog.comment:
